author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Falls as Trade War Fears Recede
text:
The dollar fell Monday, as fears of a trade conflict between the U.S. and China receded.
The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently down 0.4% at 83.07.
The Wall Street Journal reported Sunday that China and the U.S. have started negotiating to improve U.S. access to mainland Chinese markets.... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
